Key Match Events: Bo Naylor hit a solo home run in the 7th inning to spark a rally
Cleveland scored three runs in the 7th inning to take the lead
Eli Morgan picked up his second win in relief
Post-Match Reflections: Stephen Vogt praised the team's resilience in coming back from a deficit
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hunter Gaddis and Emmanuel Clase pitched well in relief
The Guardians moved one game ahead of the Royals for sole possession of first place in the AL Central
Others: Vinnie Pasquantino collected a career-high four hits for the Royals
Michael Massey and MJ Melendez also homered for Kansas City
